doc:
Jon Lindstrom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Lindstrom 0 Jon Robert Lindstrom (born October 18, 1957) is an American actor, writer, director, producer, and musician. He is well known for his role as Kevin Collins on the ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital and its spin-off Port Charles. Jon_Robert_Lindstrom ( born October_18_,_1957 ) is an_American_actor , writer , director , producer , and musician . He is_well_known for his_role as Kevin_Collins on the_ABC_Daytime_soap_opera_General_Hospital and its_spin-off_Port_Charles .
